evolver.description: Options to define operation of the evolution algorithms are set here

seed_points.name: Seed point number
seed_points.description: Define number of seed points/lineages to be used per input case

minimal_step_size.name: Evolution minimal mutation resolution
minimal_step_size.description: Evolution algorithm minimal mutation resolution for continuous degrees of freedom. Recommended value:0.00001

max_jump_range.name: Evolution maximum mutation range
max_jump_range.description: Evolution algorithm maximum mutation step size - multiple of minimal resolution. Recommended value >10.

n_fails_to_converge.name: Evolution maximum mutation range
n_fails_to_converge.description: Evolution algorithm maximum mutation step size - multiple of minimal resolution. Recommended value >10.

output.description: Options to define how output is generated is defined here

n_verbosity.name: CLI output verbosity
n_verbosity.description: Command line output verbosity - set by number of subsequently iterated generations.

full_history.description: Produce an XML file with the full evolutionary history: options 0/1

optimal_candidates.description: Produce an XML file with a set number of optimal candidates to be included per input case
